  • Method Details

    • chmod

      @Deprecated public static void chmod(File file, int mode, org.slf4j.Logger logger, boolean useJvmChmod) throws ArchiverException
      Deprecated.
      Use chmod(File, int)
      This method is now deprecated. The useJvmChmod flag is ignored as the JVM is always used. The logger provided is no longer used.
      Throws:
      ArchiverException
